Blurb: From a young age, my fascination with language—spoken, signed, and coded—has been unwavering: language is our most powerful bridge to understanding and connection. As a developer, I channel this passion to craft tools that amplify users' potential.
Bop: A music-streaming app that allows users to make and shuffle playlists, and follow their friends' favorite artists.
ThePowerOfFriendship: A minimalist puzzle platformer where a blocky, motley crew must work together to succeed.
ProjectPhantom: A React VR component library, an npx build script for easy project setup, and a VR previewer for instant website demos.
Synergia: An international LGBT human rights organization dedicated to empowering local social movements.
Verbling: A simple note-taking app. Built with create-react-app and React context API.
LiveDocs: A collaborative text editor with realtime editing, commenting, and sharing.
